title: Challenges in Big Data Analytics and Cloud Computing
abstract: The advancement of technology has brought up so many elements of ease for human beings that now humans cannot afford to think of a life without all these. But all is not about ease and comfort. Along with all these elements, there are many modern complexities as well as challenges too. Big data analytics and cloud computing are among the elements in which we face many challenges. This document discusses some of the challenges in big data analytics and cloud computing.

citations.title: Cloud Computing and its Emerging Trends on Big Data Analytics
